site.description: JDT UI Tools for JDT developers

category-def.name: ast-view
category-def.label: AST View (older versions)
category-def.description: View to visualize the Java compiler's abstract syntax tree generated for a Java file.

category-def.name: ast-view-1-1-9
category-def.label: AST View 1.1.9 for Eclipse Luna (4.4) and later
category-def.description: View to visualize the Java compiler's abstract syntax tree generated for a Java file.

category-def.name: ast-view-1-1-10
category-def.label: AST View 1.1.10 for Eclipse Luna (4.4) and later
category-def.description: View to visualize the Java compiler's abstract syntax tree generated for a Java file.

category-def.name: java-element-view
category-def.label: JavaElement View (older versions)
category-def.description: View to visualize IJavaElement and IResource handles in the Eclipse SDK.

category-def.name: java-element-view-1-0-9
category-def.label: JavaElement View 1.0.9 for Eclipse Luna (4.4) and later
category-def.description: View to visualize IJavaElement and IResource handles in the Eclipse SDK.

category-def.name: java-element-view-1-0-10
category-def.label: JavaElement View 1.0.10 for Eclipse Mars (4.5) and later
category-def.description: View to visualize IJavaElement and IResource handles in the Eclipse SDK.

category-def.name: heap-search
category-def.label: Heap Search (RefTracker)
category-def.description: View to search in the running VM's heap for instances of specified types.
